ai-anya-e0105n14:2_0: He then went to the Vāṭajirapāṇi, and stayed there.
ai-anya-e0105n14:2_1: Now, at that time I dried to teach the Dhamma to the monks. At Kāṇamātā with other religions, who had gone forth from the lay life to homelessness, it was Kāṇamāsabha. I hadn’t come down in the presence of those monks.
